personality_traits.name: Introverted
personality_traits.description: Preferring solitary activities and small groups over large gatherings.

personality_traits.name: Extroverted
personality_traits.description: Gaining energy from social interactions and being around others.

personality_traits.name: Empathetic
personality_traits.description: Understanding and sharing the feelings of others.

personality_traits.name: Analytical
personality_traits.description: Skilled at breaking down complex problems and logical reasoning.

personality_traits.name: Creative
personality_traits.description: Able to think outside the box and generate original ideas.

personality_traits.name: Organized
personality_traits.description: Maintaining structure and order in tasks and environments.

personality_traits.name: Adaptable
personality_traits.description: Flexible and able to adjust to new situations.

personality_traits.name: Reliable
personality_traits.description: Consistently dependable and trustworthy.

personality_traits.name: Confident
personality_traits.description: Having self-assurance in one's abilities.

personality_traits.name: Ambitious
personality_traits.description: Driven to achieve goals and success.

personality_traits.name: Curious
personality_traits.description: Eager to learn and explore new things.

personality_traits.name: Patient
personality_traits.description: Able to tolerate delays or problems without frustration.

personality_traits.name: Optimistic
personality_traits.description: Having a positive outlook on future events.

personality_traits.name: Pessimistic
personality_traits.description: Tending to see the worst aspect of things.

personality_traits.name: Assertive
personality_traits.description: Confidently expressing one's needs and opinions.

personality_traits.name: Gentle
personality_traits.description: Kind and mild in temperament.

personality_traits.name: Stubborn
personality_traits.description: Determined to maintain one's position or opinion.

personality_traits.name: Dependable
personality_traits.description: Consistently reliable and trustworthy.

personality_traits.name: Open-Minded
personality_traits.description: Willing to consider new ideas and perspectives.

personality_traits.name: Perfectionist
personality_traits.description: Striving for flawlessness and setting high performance standards.

personality_traits.name: Humorous
personality_traits.description: Having or showing a sense of humor.

personality_traits.name: Loyal
personality_traits.description: Showing consistent support or allegiance.

personality_traits.name: Sensitive
personality_traits.description: Easily affected by emotions or feelings.

personality_traits.name: Practical
personality_traits.description: Focused on realistic and functional solutions.

personality_traits.name: Decisive
personality_traits.description: Able to make decisions quickly and effectively.
